title: What is Apper?
subtitle: Discover the power of no-code development

sections.heading: Welcome to Apper
sections.content: Apper is a revolutionary no-code platform that empowers anyone to build powerful web applications without writing a single line of code. Whether you're an entrepreneur with a big idea, a small business owner looking to digitize operations, or someone who wants to bring their creative vision to life, Apper makes it possible.

sections.heading: Key Features
items: Drag-and-drop visual editor for intuitive app building
Pre-built templates and components to get started quickly
Responsive design that works on all devices

title: Why Apper Stands Out
subtitle: What makes us different from other platforms

sections.heading: Unique Advantages
sections.content: Unlike traditional development or other no-code platforms, Apper focuses on simplicity without sacrificing power. Our intelligent design system learns from your preferences and suggests improvements, making the building process faster and more intuitive.

sections.heading: Comparison with Alternatives
items: Faster learning curve than traditional coding
More flexible than rigid website builders
Better performance than other no-code platforms

sections.heading: Industry Solutions
sections.content: Apper serves businesses across all industries. From restaurants managing online orders to consultants tracking client projects, from artists showcasing portfolios to nonprofits organizing events - the possibilities are limitless.

title: Create Your First App
subtitle: Step-by-step guide to building your first application

steps.title: Choose a Template
steps.description: Browse our template library and select one that matches your vision. You can always customize it completely later.

steps.title: Set Up Your Project
steps.description: Give your app a name and choose your preferred color scheme. These can be changed anytime.

steps.title: Add Your Content
steps.description: Replace placeholder text and images with your own content using our intuitive editor.

steps.title: Customize the Design
steps.description: Use the visual editor to adjust layouts, colors, fonts, and spacing to match your brand.

steps.title: Preview and Test
steps.description: Use our preview mode to test your app on different devices and screen sizes.

title: The Apper Builder Interface
subtitle: Master the tools that will bring your ideas to life

sections.heading: Interface Overview
sections.content: The Apper builder interface is designed for maximum productivity and ease of use. The main workspace shows your app as you build it, while side panels provide access to components, styling options, and settings.

sections.heading: Key Interface Elements
items: Canvas: The main working area where you build your app
Component Library: Drag-and-drop elements like buttons, forms, and images
Properties Panel: Customize the selected element's appearance and behavior
Pages Panel: Manage different pages of your application
Preview Mode: See how your app looks to end users
Publishing Options: Deploy your app with one click

title: What Happens Behind the Scenes
subtitle: Understanding how Apper works its magic

sections.heading: The Technology
sections.content: While you focus on design and functionality, Apper automatically generates clean, optimized code behind the scenes. Our platform uses modern web technologies to ensure your apps are fast, secure, and scalable.

sections.heading: Automatic Optimizations
items: Code optimization for faster loading times
SEO optimization for better search rankings

title: Editing and Expanding the App
subtitle: Grow and improve your application over time

sections.heading: Making Changes
sections.content: Your app is never truly finished. Apper makes it easy to update content, add new features, and respond to user feedback. All changes can be made instantly without any downtime.

sections.heading: Expansion Options
items: Add new pages and sections as your business grows
Set up user accounts and membership systems
Add e-commerce functionality and payment processing
Implement advanced features like search and filtering

title: Troubleshooting Errors
subtitle: Common issues and how to solve them

sections.heading: Common Issues
sections.content: Don't worry if you encounter issues while building - it's part of the learning process! Most problems have simple solutions, and our platform provides helpful error messages to guide you.

sections.heading: Quick Fixes
items: Clear your browser cache if the editor seems slow
Check your internet connection for sync issues
Refresh the page if components aren't loading
Use the undo feature to revert unwanted changes
Contact support through the help chat for assistance
Check our knowledge base for detailed troubleshooting guides

title: App Versions
subtitle: Managing different versions of your application

sections.heading: Version Control
sections.content: Apper automatically saves versions of your app as you work, allowing you to revert to previous states if needed. You can also create manual save points before making major changes.

sections.heading: Version Features
items: Automatic daily backups of your app
Manual save points for major milestones
Compare different versions side by side
Restore any previous version with one click
Branch versions for testing new features

title: Mobile vs Desktop Preview
subtitle: Ensuring your app works perfectly on all devices

sections.heading: Responsive Design
sections.content: Every app built with Apper automatically adapts to different screen sizes. Our preview mode lets you see exactly how your app will look on phones, tablets, and desktops.

sections.heading: Preview Options
items: Share preview links with others for feedback
Test touch interactions on mobile devices

title: Manage App Settings
subtitle: Configure your app's behavior and appearance

sections.heading: General Settings
sections.content: App settings control how your application behaves and appears to users. From basic information like the app name and description to advanced features like custom domains and analytics.

title: Onboarding and Emails
subtitle: Engage your users with automated communications

sections.heading: User Onboarding
sections.content: Great apps guide users through their first experience. Apper provides tools to create welcome sequences, tutorial overlays, and progressive disclosure of features.

sections.heading: Email Features
items: Welcome email sequences for new users
Custom email templates with your branding
Analytics on email open rates and clicks

sections.heading: Monetization Options
sections.content: Turn your app into a revenue-generating business with Apper's built-in billing and payment processing. Accept one-time payments, recurring subscriptions, or implement complex pricing models.

sections.heading: Revenue Features
items: One-time payments for products or services
Multiple payment methods (credit cards, PayPal, etc.)

title: Code Section (Optional)
subtitle: For developers who want to extend functionality

sections.heading: Custom Code
sections.content: While Apper is designed for no-code users, developers can add custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to extend functionality. This gives you the best of both worlds - visual building with the option for custom code.

title: Database Setup
subtitle: Store and manage your application data

sections.heading: Data Management
sections.content: Every app needs to store data. Apper provides an easy-to-use database system that grows with your needs. From simple contact forms to complex inventory systems, we've got you covered.

sections.heading: Database Features
items: Visual database designer - no SQL required
Automatic scaling based on your app's needs
Import data from spreadsheets and other sources
Real-time data updates across all users
